content.description: This fun warmup traverse follows the featured lip of the largest talus boulder. Starting on the right side of the lip on a jug, move left, crossing through crimps and slopers. The crux is moving around the corner onto a slippery sloper, then continuing up jugs on the arete with bad feet to the topout.
content.protection: A pad and someone to move it. The problem isn't high, but there's a sharp rock below the crux.
content.location: In the pile of boulders below the Building Blocks section. The tallest boulder has an obvious lip that faces the Petroleum Based Buttress.

content.description: This uninspiring inside corner is most useful as a quick means of accessing anchors on the Petroleum Based wall and FK Face. Easily soloed, but protectable with trad gear, the route climbs up onto a low ledge, then follows a fun layback crack up the corner until the route devolves into scrambling over boulders towards the top.
content.protection: Takes gear to 3". Two bolt anchor at top.
content.location: Right of Petroleum Based, shares a start with Chossy's Revenge but breaks right.

content.description:
This is a 30 foot crag that faces east. To the right is Inner Walls. There was an anchor with a chain on top. 

  L->R:   A. North End Crack, 4.   B1. Painted Lady, 9.   B2. Painted Lady Direct, 11.   C. Perversion, 4.   D. Norton Luvs Trixy, 3.   E. Easy, 2.   F. Presumptuous Assumptions, 3.   G. Taxi Service, 6.
